item.title: What Should I Watch? Noer's Official Top Recommendations
item.description: What Should I Watch? This isn’t as common of a question but I have been asked from time to time. Someone will be onboard with the method and say something like Great! I understand how this works now… but everything is too hard and I have no idea what to watch. Which has always been bizarre to me. Just follow your interests. Perhaps a better explanation is needed.

item.title: Why You Should(n't) Take a Break
item.description: Small Break This past month I have been less active in online immersion learning circles. I’ve been absent from Refold, an acquaintances server, and this blog. I’ve had a couple major life events happen and as a result didn’t have much choice in having to put Japanese to the side. Nothing major happened though and I’m fine. I always feared having to take a break but having gone through it I think I’ve come away with a new perspective.
